title: Every Goddamn Skip
content:
[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]

+ LOOK UPON MY VAST NUMBER OF TALES, YE MIGHTY, AND DESPAIR!
~LutherC from #site19

Hi, my name is Ricky/Cio, I'm --21-- --23-- --24-- //**25**// (omg) now, and I never fuckin' learned how to read. 

I am currently writing a tale for every SCP on site. My progress will be documented here, on my author page.

Wow remember when I made that goal? I sure do. And what a ride it's been since then! Anyway, this series is getting a massive overhaul so. Prepare for things to change!

Wow remember when I last edited this in like June 2020? I sure do! Anyway I'm almost 23 now! Wow! But this goal of mine has yet to change or completely die! SO guess what? I'll be re-writing this series! Adding more content! Yahoo! Expect complete insanity soon!

Wow remember the last edit to this page? I'm now 25, turning 26 in September, and SCP still holds a special place in my heart. One day, I'll come back to the tale of Eli and Dictator, especially now that I'm a better writer.
